author: The Current
description:
Watch a solo acoustic performance by singer-songwriter Anna Graves
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube or hit the Thanks button

Minnesota-born singer-songwriter Anna Graves has spent time in Los Angeles and in Nashville, but it's in Minnesota that she feels the most connection. "It's really a place where I draw a lot of inspiration," Graves told The Local Show host Diane during a June 2025 interview. While making that visit to The Current, Anna Graves stopped in to our studio to record solo acoustic versions of three songs, including an unreleased song that speaks to Graves' Minnesota roots. Watch the performances above.

Songs Performed
00:00:00 Made To Love Someone
00:03:47 Bluebird
00:08:07 Minnesota On My Mind
Song 1 is from Graves' 2024 EP 'Solstice,' available on Island Records; song 2 was released as a single in 2025; song 3 is unreleased.  

Musician
Anna Graves

Credits

title: Anna Graves plays three songs at The Current
